name: Might and Magic II: Gates to Another World
name_original: Might and Magic II: Gates to Another World
description:
Might and Magic II: Gates to Another World (also known as Might and Magic Book Two: Gates to Another World) is a role-playing video game developed and published by New World Computing in 1988. It is the sequel to Might and Magic Book One: The Secret of the Inner Sanctum.

Original advertisment description:

Unravel the dark mystery of a sorcerer-king who's been dead for over a hundred years?

Choose from 8 character classes as you create your own unique band of adventurers. Customize each of them with over 15 skills and traits. Quickstart your quest with five exciting pre-rolled characters.

-Choose from over 250 types of weapons and armour
-Master 96 magic spells for combat and exploration
-Experience over 100 hours of adventuring
-Battery backup included so you can save your game
-Over 150 pages of clues, maps, and illustrations
